messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Construct Bravo, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The AI is rouge, im not the acting captain now and im leaving to be a humble scientist, BYE!

messages.author: Colten Newbern (Curator)
messages.body:
Space Station 13 News
Issue #1
Pet of the Month!

Ian Is currently the pet of the month because he is generaly great, im more a fan of cats than dogs and i absolutly love Ian. We interveiwed him today where he said the following statement,"Bark! Bark!" We assumed this to mean Hi, but we do not know. Ian was not currently wearing anything but if anyone could give us a hat we would have him wear it for the next Pet of The Month! Ian is great, protect Ian.

Bark Rating: 10/bork

messages.author: Colten Newbern (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">The first annual meeting of book club occured today where 5 people were supposed to come and read H.P. Lovecraft as well as other nice literature clasics. There is the possibility that they are having a cult meeting but at least they are reading. The meeting was canceled after nobody except for one person came and brought porn.</font>

messages.author: Colten Newbern (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">As of writing this the Shadowperson who has been called a demon by some, is still breaking lights, lights are still broken and there is no word on if they will be fixed. Anger arrises as many cannot see their work.</font>
